response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe holds significant value for you. Given its importance to both of us, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $950,000. This represents a substantial discount compared to its market value and provides you with a unique opportunity to acquire it at a favorable rate. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and financial considerations. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
